infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Adventure Time needs your location to track your off-road adventures, show nearby trails, and provide GPS navigation to trailheads.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Adventure Time needs your location to track your adventures even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Adventure Time needs camera access for AI Recovery Scan to analyze recovery situations and provide equipment recommendations.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Adventure Time needs photo library access to save and analyze recovery situation photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Adventure Time needs permission to save photos to your library.
